path.description: Path to the custom webpack configuration file

replaceDuplicatePlugins.description: Flag that indicates whether to replace duplicate webpack plugins or not

verbose.description: Determines whether to log configuration properties into a console

properties.description: A list of properties to log into a console, for instance, `['plugins', 'mode', 'entry']`

serializationDepth.description: The number of times to recurse the object while formatting

indexTransform.description: Path to the file with index.html transform function
